title: How to unsubscribe from Player.pl
description: Player.pl is a Polish video-on-demand and streaming service offering programs from TVN Warner Bros. Discovery and other partners. To cancel your Player.pl subscription, follow these steps:

web.title: Cancel Player.pl Subscription via Website
web.description:
To cancel your Player.pl subscription through their website, follow these steps:

*   Sign in to your Player.pl account on their website.
*   Go to your account settings. Look for sections labeled 'Account', 'Subscriptions', or 'Billing'.
*   Find the subscription management area.
*   Select the option to cancel your subscription.
*   Confirm your cancellation. You should receive a confirmation message or email.
*   Note the date your access will end. You'll typically retain access until the end of your paid period.
*   Verify that recurring billing has been stopped.

seo_text: Cancel Player.pl subscription. Stop recurring billing for Player.pl. Player.pl cancellation guide. How to end Player.pl subscription.
